One order is for 6 pom poms
You can hang them, stick them to walls, or even add them on top of your chair sashes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Splaying from all the sides, our gorgeously flared pom poms are absolutely fab! Dangling magically from your ceilings, tree branches, or fixtures, these fluffy pom poms seem to float enchantingly in midair. These paper pom poms are an amazing embellishment to every occasion. From rehearsal dinners to weddings, showers to Halloween and Christmas Parties, or even birthday bashes, these vibrant hanging puffs provide a cheery and whimsical way to add more color and verve to any party venue. Hang them up a ceiling or a tree, bundle them high into corners, place around a candle holder, make into a centerpiece atop a centerpiece holder, or snip away for a paper project-whatever your urges, fancies, and out-of-the-box plans are, use these fanciful pom poms to impart a fluffier, softer, and dreamlike look to them!

Additional Information:

  • Material: Tissue Paper
  • Dimensions: 14" Diameter
  • Easy to assemble.
  • One order is for 6 pom poms
  • You can hang them, stick them to walls, or even add them on top of your chair sashes

[Information]

Revamp your home décor with this pair of Thermal Grommet Curtain Panels in chic chevron pattern that will instantly give your space a contemporary update. Our innovative Thermal Insulated Curtain Panels are crafted from 100% polyester and feature blackout light filtration that assists in giving you a perfectly tranquil environment to rest easy and also reduce your utility costs by insulating unwanted light, UV rays, noise, heat, and cold. These functional curtains are constructed with blackout fibers interwoven to the curtains fabric, providing a layer of added insulation against light diffusion and outside temperature transfer for energy efficacy qualities. It is so easy now to darken a room for daytime sleep, movie watching, or to prevent sunlight glare, with our 100% Thermal Eyelet Top Curtain Panels.

    Add a touch of refined luxury to any space with our latest Designer Blackout Curtain Panels, featuring soft velvet design for a touch of texture. entry.summary:

[About]

Quantity: 2 Glass Vases (Different Size)
Material: Glass
Color: Matte White
Style: Matte Finish Geometric Glass Vases
Small Vase Size: 5.5"H x 6.25"W
Large Vase Size: 7.75"H x 5.75"W
Glass Thickness: 5mm
Small Vase Top Opening: 3"
Small Vase Base: 3.5"
Small Vase Depth: 4.75"
Large Vase Top Opening: 4.25"
Large Vase Base: 4.25"
Large Vase Depth: 7.5" 
Base of both vases are clear / see-through
Small Vase has Top and Base shaped as a Pentagon
Large Vase has Top and Base shaped as a Hexagon
Perfect for floral and candle displays
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Small size ideal for placement on shelf, windowsill, desk, and tabletop surfaces
  • Unique geometric design complements modern decors
  • Item is for Vases Only. Flowers and other decorative accessories not included.
  • Great for everyday decor or for use as decorative centerpieces for weddings and special events
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

[Information]

Made from heavy duty and high quality see-through glass, our stylish range of decorative Candle Holders makes an ideal adornment and eye-catching decorative accents for any party or home décor. Our hand blown cube Candle Holders with their thick walls and weighted base will give a modern twist to any floral or centerpiece decoration. These glass centerpiece block Candle Holders will instantly add flair and visual appeal to any ordinary party or table setting. This size is perfect for short candles; may also fill with jelly filler balls or acrylic ice crystals of your theme color and top with a submersible LED or a floating candle to create exotic decorative accent. For an even more luxurious look and feel, swathe our satin or organza ribbons around with a cute bow or a flower to make an ethereal party favor or a votive candle holder

Additional Information:

  • Material: Premium Glass
  • Color: Clear
  • Qty: 1pcs per order
  • Height: 4"
  • Width: 4''
  • Glass wall Thickness: 4mm
  • Heavy Duty Glass
  • Inclusion: Top choice for candle shops & wedding planner.
  • Each Candle Holder is hand-crafted, some slight variations between each may occur.
  • Uses:  Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
  • NOTE: This item not suitable for Int'l Shipping, to our international customers, please order at your own risk.

 How to Care:

  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all Candle Holders should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.
Glass items : Despite durable boxes and careful shipping, damages in transit are sometimes unavoidable.
If it happens, we reserve the right to either replace or refund at our discretion.
